3descriptionP: A journal management system built to securely store and manage entries, offering an intuitive interface for users to log their thoughts and experiences. The platform allows for easy sign-ins using Firestore authentication, ensuring secure access. Users can add, edit, and track their journal entries, with all data saved seamlessly in the cloud for easy retrieval and privacy.
text1: I'm a web developer with experience in designing interactive UIs and creating Full Stack solutions. I enjoy learning new technologies and improving my skills to build efficient, scalable apps.
list1: Programming Languages: Java, Python, C#, JavaScript, TypeScript
list2: Frameworks & Libraries: React, Astro, .NET, MERN (MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js), Tailwind CSS, Oak (Deno)
list3: Databases: SQL, MySQL; design and query optimization
list4: Tools & Methodologies: Node.js, Yarn, Docker, Git, Jest, Figma; best business practices, systems analysis & design
list5: Frontend Development: Design & development of interactive, responsive UIs with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, ensuring a smooth, engaging experience.
list6: UX/UI Optimization: Creating effective landing pages optimized for conversion, applying modern design & user experience principles.
list7: Databases: Managing relational (MySQL) and non-relational databases, focusing on efficient design and optimized queries.
list8: Tech Integration: Implementing Full Stack projects with modern frameworks like MERN and tools like Docker, Socket.io, and Postman.
contactMe: I am available for new projects, collaborations, or any inquiries. Feel free to reach out!
